Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "From the report of the retriever, I'm sure those residues are almost identical to the antigen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Can't believe how fast it is for me to complete the mission, having traveled such a long way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '(Looks at the pinky bone in her hand) ...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I was going to take you away from this hell...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Please forgive me that this uninfected piece of you is all I can bring with me...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'll bury you in a nice place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '(Puts the bone away) You take a good rest now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "(Looks up at the floating gold dust) But I'm still pissed...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...Comms isn't working, so I can't tell how it's going with Lucia and her group.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...Or she might have left already with her mission completed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I can't beat Lucia if I'm happy with just completing my objective!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Now, I've already got a grasp on the engineering structure of the Golden Vortex...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If I can hand in a comprehensive engineering report, I'll surely put the technicians in Babylonia to shame.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I might even be able to speak at the Engineer Annual Conference...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'll send an invitation to Lucia then for sure!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Then it's decided! I'll continue exploring the Golden Vortex!", 4: '1'}
